Message.MsgText: INVALID_FILTER_EMF=CWSAF2005E: An internal error occurred. A service filter could not be parsed.
NO_WAB_BUNDLE_CONTEXT=CWSAF2003E: An internal error occurred. The OSGi application {0} at version {1} is not in a valid state to request resources.
INVALID_FILTER_EM=CWSAF2004E: An internal error occurred. A service filter could not be parsed.
MULTIPLE_PERSISTENCE_CONTEXTS=CWSAF2007W: Multiple persistence contexts with the name {0} were found by the web bundle {1} at version {2}.
Message.Explanation: The OSGi JPA container found multiple persistence contexts with the same name. This is not a valid configuration, and might lead to inconsistent results.
Message.UserResponse: Change the OSGi application so that it no longer contains bundles that define multiple persistence contexts with the same name.

Message.MsgText: EXTENDED_SCOPE_UNSUPPORTED=CWSAF2001E: An OSGi web bundle {0} at version {1} defines a dependency on the managed JPA persistence context {2} with extended scope. Extended scope persistence contexts are not supported by the OSGi JPA container.
Message.Explanation: An application declared a dependency on an extended scope JPA persistence context, but extended scope persistence contexts are not supported in the OSGi JPA container.
Message.UserResponse: Change the application to make use of either application managed or transaction scope persistence contexts.

Message.MsgText: UNABLE_TO_LOCATE_PCP=CWSAF2002E: An internal error occurred. The OSGi Applications runtime environment could not initialize persistence context support.
MULTIPLE_PERSISTENCE_UNITS=CWSAF2006W: Multiple persistence units with the name {0} were found by the web bundle {1} at version {2}.
Message.Explanation: The OSGi JPA container found multiple persistence units with the same name. This is not a valid configuration, and might lead to inconsistent results.
Message.UserResponse: Change the OSGi application so that it no longer contains bundles that define multiple persistence units with the same name.
